Join Now 1 2 3 4 › Back to top How to read Good Sam Directory Ratings The three-number rating that accompanies each campground listing in the directory gives readers an at-a-glance assessment of a campground's amenities, cleanliness and environment. All three ratings categories are measured on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the best. Less than 1 percent of parks or campgrounds receive the coveted 10 | 10 ★ | 10 rating, which indicates superior facilities that are well maintained, clean, well-appointed restrooms and a highly appealing appearance. Campgrounds are inspected annually by dedicated RVers like you. Completeness of facilities 10 | 10 ★ | 10 The first campground rating evaluates completeness and quality of facilities. In this category we rate interior roads, sites, registration area, hookups, recreation, swimming, security, laundry, store and building maintenance. Cleanliness of restrooms and showers 10 | 10 ★ | 10 The second rating category concerns the cleanliness and physical characteristics of toilets, walls, showers, sinks/counters/mirrors and floor. If a park achieves a full point in each of the above, it receives a star ( ★ ), indicating exceptionally clean restrooms. Also rated are physical characteristics of restrooms, including interior construction, adequate supplies/odor free, adequate number of facilities, exterior appearance and location in relation to park spaces, and interior appearance. Visual appeal and environmental quality 10 | 10 ★ | 10 This category addresses the park's setting and site layout, function and identification of signage, overall exterior building maintenance, noise, trash disposal, litter and debris around the grounds and sites, and appearance of grounds, sites and entrance area. TRIP CONCIERGE Who We Are Our Story Resource Center Team Contact Us News & Press BEECause RVC Cares Photo Gallery Blog Cottage Sales SPECIAL OFFERS Press enter to begin your search Close Search Resource Center Team Andy Cates Chief Executive Officer and General Partner Andrew F. Cates (Andy) is the Founder and CEO of RVC Outdoor Destinations ( www.rvcoutdoors.com ), the leading owner, operator, and developer of high-quality outdoor resorts in the United States. He is also the Managing Member of Value Acquisition Fund ( www.valfund.com ), an acquisition, development, and asset management company. READ MORE > In 1999, Cates was the Founding Chairman and Project Developer of the Soulsville Revitalization Project ( www.soulsvillefoundation.org ), one of the largest inner city revitalization projects in the United States that includes The Stax Museum, Soulsville Charter School, and Stax Music Academy. In the summer of 2000, Cates worked with a team of business and civic leaders to attract the Vancouver Grizzlies National Basketball Association franchise to Memphis, Tennessee and was a Limited Partner in the original ownership group. Cates began his real estate career in Dallas working for the Trammell Crow Company and Crow Investment Trust (now Crow Family Holdings) as a member of the team responsible for partnership and loan workouts, office and industrial acquisitions, asset management, and commercial real estate development. After leaving Crow, Cates was a founding partner in Viceroy Investments, LLC based in Dallas, Texas and is currently a partner in two Viceroy sponsored partnerships. Cates served on the Board of Directors of Pioneer Natural Resources (NYSE:PXD) from 2009 – 2020. Over his more than eleven years of service, Pioneer was the top performing energy stock in United States. Cates also served on the Board of Directors of PICO Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:PICO) from 2016 – 2017 where he helped lead a turnaround that resulted in a 55% increase in the stock price over his 18-month tenure. In 2018, Cates founded Memphis Fourth Estate, Inc. ( www.memphisfourthestate.org ) which created and now oversees The Daily Memphian ( www.dailymemphian.com ), the largest locally oriented “digital newspaper” in the United States. He currently serves as its Board Chairman. Cates earned a Bachelor of Business Administration (Finance) degree at the University of Texas at Austin. In addition to currently serving on the Memphis Fourth Estate board, he serves on the boards of the Myelin Repair Foundation and Memphis University School. Lloyd Lauland President Lloyd oversees all operations of RVC, bringing a fresh perspective and preparing the company for unprecedented growth by recruiting new talent, establishing best in class Accounting and Administrative Systems and ensuring that all operational areas of the company align with the company’s strategic vision. Lloyd’s sense of adventure and his passion for expanding customer satisfaction at every touch point perfectly aligns with RVC’s core mission of providing an outdoor destination experience, with the blend of location, accommodation and modern amenities. ​ READ MORE > Lauland is a 36 + year hospitality veteran who joined RVC after a highly successful tenure with Interstate Hotels & Resorts in several executive management roles including Vice President of Operations and Executive Director of JHM Interstate India. During the five years he led JHMI India, the company established itself as a true pioneer in third party hospitality management and grew from one management contract to thirteen, before returning to the States. During his career is has worked for such prestigious international and independent brands as Hyatt, Four Seasons, Hilton, Marriott and the historic Brown Palace Hotel in Denver.​ When not busy with RVC, Lloyd and his wife Linda, stay busy keeping up with their two grown sons, and Lily, their three-year-old yellow lab who Linda is training to become a therapy dog.​ Matt Uselton Executive Vice President Matt is responsible for leading RVC’s real estate acquisition, development and asset management efforts. His career in finance and commercial real estate has also included mergers and acquisitions, capital allocation strategy, disposition, project management, property management, financial analysis and modeling, data analytics and appraisal. Upon graduating from the University of Memphis with a Bachelors of Business Administration in Finance, Matt worked as a commercial real estate development analyst with Loeb Properties before joining Valbridge Property Advisors, the largest independent commercial property valuation and advisory services firm in the nation, as a Senior Analyst and Registered Appraisal Trainee.​ READ MORE > Outside of work, Matt is a professional musician with a career spanning over 10-years as a live and studio guitarist along with years of teaching, song-writing and studio production. He is a native Memphian who enjoys spending his time with his wife Alison and their two daughters, Eliza and Charlotte. Mary Jean Campchiaro Corporate Controller As RVC’s Corporate Controller, Mary Jean is responsible for all company accounting systems and financial reporting functions. She is a graduate of the University of Memphis with a BBA in accounting. Mary Jean comes to RVC with over 32 years of hospitality accounting experience. READ MORE > Mary Jean leads RVC’s Accounting team. She graduated from the University of Memphis with a Bachelor’s of Business Administration in Accounting. Before joining RVC, Mary Jean was Vice President of Hotel Accounting at Davidson Hotel Company, overseeing the accounting and reporting functions of 30+ hotels. When the company relocated, she joined McNeill Hotel Company as Vice President – Accounting, setting up the accounting processes and assisting in growing the company from one hotel to over 20. ​ Outside of the office, Mary Jean enjoys spending time with her family.​ Cory Felty Accounting Manager Cory serves in our accounting department and oversees the financial reporting functions for all RVC resorts and business entities. READ MORE > Cory joined RVC after two years at ALCO where he worked as a Portfolio Accountant for over 30 apartment complexes across the United States and a Property Administrator for the Housing Corporation at First Tennessee. Cory earned his BS in Accounting from the University of Arkansas and enjoys exploring pet-friendly craft breweries with his rescue dog “Bella”. Kathy Allen Director of Call Center Operations Kathy Mccurrie Allen directs RVC Outdoor Destination’s Call Center for all RVC’s resort locations across the United States. She comes to RVC with over 17 years of experience in Operations Management and Training in a Call center environment, industry concentration in pharmacy billing, and contracts. READ MORE > Before transitioning to RVC, Kathy was Sr. Contract and Reimbursement Manager with Accredo and Express Scripts Pharmacy. She managed the insurance revenue department where her proficiencies included:  Reimbursement Hubs, Pharma Manufacturers, Government State benefits, Group Purchasing Organization, and Direct Pharmacy benefit liaison. Kathy loves spending time with her husband and their rescue Labrador Retriever Pullium, she continues to write short stories reflecting on her travels and experiences of the world. Wonders never cease on the Choctawhatchee Bay—minutes from the country’s finest beaches in South Walton, Co, Florida. At Live Oak Landing, you’ll find diverse, world-class fishing, oak-studded trails, picture-perfect views, easy access and upscale amenities. Learn more about why our RV Resort is the perfect place for your beach vacation in the Destin/30-A area. RV SITES COTTAGES FISHING AREA ACTIVITIES LONG-TERM STAYS RV Site Rentals World-Class Fishing Gulf Coast Activities Choose Your Best Way to Stay: 1 1 Premium RV Sites We offer level sites with modern concrete pads, 30/50 amp & 100 amp power, and exceptional on-site amenities. MORE INFO 1 1 Resort Cottages Our fully-furnished cottages offer the perfect alternative to RV or tent camping. Find the best fit for your stay! MORE INFO 1 1 Own Your Own Cottage! You don’t have to be wealthy to have a first-class property on the water. A more flexible & affordable way for a second home! MORE INFO On-Site Amenities: Saline Swimming Pool Boat Rentals Children’s Playground Event Pavilions Discover What We Offer Frequently Asked Questions What kind of RV sites do you have? We offer both back-in and pull-through big-rig friendly sites. What is your cancellation policy? We offer our “ Peace of Mind ” rate, which, with 72-hours notice prior to your arrival is fully refundable and less than a 10% cancellation fee except during holiday periods. In addition, we also offer our “Best Available” rate, which is set in stone with no changes or cancellations. You will be given the option to choose between the two rates at the time of booking. Is there a minimum night stay requirement? Only during holidays, there is a 3-night minimum and all reservations are non-refundable: Memorial Day, 4th of July, and Labor Day. How do I request a specific site or area? Please give us a call at (877) 436-5063 and we will do our best to accommodate your request. Is it pet friendly? What breeds? Yes, we are a pet-friendly property (dogs and cats only). Please visit our Pet Policy page for complete details. We have a strict pet leash policy to protect all guests and pets. Pets must be leashed at all times while on property. This is one of the biggest violations we encounter with our guests. As far as breed restrictions, we don’t necessarily have any. Any guest in violation of pet policies will be fined and/or asked to leave, regardless of the pet’s breed. Do you sell cottages? Yes, we offer options for cottage ownership! Ownership is exactly what it means—true ownership of the unit (unlike a timeshare). This is a better, more flexible and more affordable way to have a second home—while you also benefit from rentals. If you are interested in learning more, please complete a contact form here . Plan your visit to Live Oak Landing today! The Love × Our Mission To create a luxury vacation rental brand with world-class owner and guest experience, extraordinary property care, and a proactive team exceeding expectations. Over 750 Properties in Strategic Destinations Discover I Love Vacations rental properties Sedona, Arizona Scottsdale, Arizona Austin, Texas Hawaii Whitefish, Montana 30a, Florida Dripping Springs, Texas Cabo San Lucas, Mexico How It All Started 1999 2004 2006 2013 2014 2016 2018 2020 2021 Park City Rental Properties Founded 1999 Purchased 4 properties in Park City and couldn’t find a good vacation rental manager, so we started our own vacation rental company! Park City Rental Properties founded in 1999! Main Office Opened 2004 Opened our first office on Main Street in Park City, Utah. Online Presence 2006 Expanded our websites to include multiple websites in Park City, Utah. 100 Luxury Properties 2013 Reached 100 luxury vacation rentals in Park City, Utah. Started looking at other Territories in the US. Expanded Territories 2014 Started Sedona and Hawaii territories. I Love Vacations Founded 2016 Started our national brand I Love Vacations. Expanded Territories 2018 Started Dripping Springs, Austin and Scottsdale territories. Expanded Territories 2020 Started Whitefish, Montana territory. Expanded Territories 2021 Started Cabo and 30a Florida territories. Meet the Park City Rental Properties Team Kenny Green President Jen Ali Director of Owner Relations Jim Anderson Business Development Executive With a background in Park City and Deer Valley real estate, Jim transitioned over to the vacation rental management world to help PCRP grow its owner base. He is an expert at networking, growing the sphere of influence, connecting with the local real estate community, and helping owners and Realtors better understand the rental market. His vast knowledge of the area and the vacation rental market allows him to guide people in the right direction when they are looking for cash flow properties. Jim has a Bachelor’s Degree in Real Estate Finance and Development from Central Michigan University. Operations Team Jake Mulvey Director of Operations Jake has called Park City home for over a decade. For the past seven years, he worked with the PCRP Sales and Revenue teams before recently transitioning to a role in Operations. A true enthusiast of everything Park City has to offer, Jake enjoys snowboarding, mountain biking, golfing, and hiking with his dogs. He holds an accounting degree from Appalachian State University. Caleb Weis Operations Manager Mitchell Heberer Operations Manager Witzen Rodriguez Operations Manager Owner Relations Team Jennie Munguia Owner Relations Manager Lynne LeBlanc Owner Relations Manager Amanda Evenstad Owner Relations Manager Amanda is a Utah native who brings a decade of experience in real estate and operations to her role as Owner Relations Manager. Her experience ranges from property renovations and HOA management to leading top-producing teams, equipping her with both strategic insight and on-the-ground know-how. Focusing on simplifying the complex details so owners and guests experience a smooth, worry-free stay. When she’s not helping properties thrive, you can find her at the local farmers' markets, hitting the slopes, or enjoying a good game of billiards. Sandra Engel Owner Relations Manager After spending 15 years as an International Tax Manager with KPMG, I decided to trade spreadsheets for something a little more “chill” (haha) and joined Park City Rental Properties in 2017. Shortly after starting, I became the Regional Onboarding Manager for all our locations (busy, busy) and now part of the Owner Relations team.
 
When I’m not helping owners, you’ll find me making the most of Park City’s charm—soaking up the summer sunshine, catching a show or concert at The Egyptian Theatre, enjoying outdoor live music and fun festivals, or exploring hiking and biking trails. Add in a glass of good wine, good friends, and some crisp mountain air, and I’m exactly where I want to be. × Get In Touch 314 Main Street, Suite 101 Park City, Utah 84060 (435) 200-1223 reservations@parkcityvacationrentals.com Follow Us Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Owner Login Popular Links All Park City Rentals All Deer Valley Vacation Rentals All Canyon Rentals Additional Communities Search All Vacation Rentals Holiday Rentals Alphabetical Property List About Us Our Rentals Condo Rentals Home Rentals Mansion Rentals Ski In/Out Spring Rentals Rental Deals © 2025 Park City Rental Properties Vacation Rentals Know the unit name?
